title: DkIT
content: Dundalk Institute of Technology is the best place to study computing in Ireland. For more information, see our website www.dkit.ie

title: Dundalk
content: Dundalk (Irish: DÃºn Dealgan) is the county town of County Louth, Ireland. The town is situated on the Castletown River, which flows into Dundalk Bay on the north-east coast of Ireland, and is halfway between Dublin and Belfast, close to and south of the border with Northern Ireland.

title: Blackrock
content: Blackrock is a seaside village that is close to DkIT.

title: Rocksalt Cafe
content: Rocksalt Cafe is a cafe located in Blackrock, Co. Louth. It is a great place to have lunch.

title: Hotel du Vin Wimbledon
content: A stylish boutique hotel located in Cannizaro House, Hotel du Vin offers elegant rooms and fine dining just minutes from Wimbledon Village.
